name: Oniguisama
description:
-Synopsis-

A young girl, after being bullied to the point of no longer being able to go to school, decided that it was finally time to see if the rumors were true about a god that was said to be at a nearby shrine who would answer any question as long as you gave it snacks.
What truths will she learn about her bullying, and the mysterious god at the shrine...?

A simple, short horror novel game.
Estimated time: 7 minutes

シンプルな短編ホラーノベルゲームです。
日本語、英語、スペイン語の選択ができます。

所要時間：約7分

Una novela corta sin decisiones que dura alrededor de 7 minutos.
